verses.text: Unto \w the|strong="H0559"\w* end; \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* octave, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* psalm \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*.

Save \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, O Lord, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w there|strong="H2009"\w* \w is|strong="H3820"\w* \w now|strong="H2009"\w* no saint: truths \w are|strong="H7563"\w* decayed \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w among|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* children \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w men|strong="H7563"\w*.

\w They|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3588"\w* spoken vain things every \w one|strong="H6662"\w* \w to|strong="H6662"\w* \w his|strong="H3588"\w* neighbour: \w with|strong="H6662"\w* deceitful lips, \w and|strong="H6662"\w* \w with|strong="H6662"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* double heart \w have|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* spoken.

\w May|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* destroy all deceitful lips, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* tongue \w that|strong="H3068"\w* speaketh \w proud|strong="H5869"\w* \w things|strong="H6944"\w*.

\w Who|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* said: \w We|strong="H5315"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* magnify \w our|strong="H3068"\w* tongue; \w our|strong="H3068"\w* lips \w are|strong="H7563"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w own|strong="H5315"\w*; \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w over|strong="H3068"\w* \w us|strong="H5315"\w*?

\w By|strong="H5921"\w* \w reason|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H7307"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* misery \w of|strong="H7307"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* needy, \w and|strong="H0784"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* groans \w of|strong="H7307"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* poor, now \w will|strong="H7563"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* arise, saith \w the|strong="H5921"\w* Lord. \w I|strong="H5921"\w* win set \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* safety; \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H7563"\w* deal confidently \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w regard|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w The|strong="H6440"\w* words \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* pure words: \w as|strong="H3068"\w* silver tried \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* fire, purged \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* earth refined seven \w times|strong="H6440"\w*.
Thou, O Lord, wilt preserve us: and keep us from this generation for ever.
The wicked walk round about: according to thy highness, thou best multiplied the children of men.
